resources.string:
Terms of Service

Effective Date: October 14, 2016

1. Accept
These HMD Global Terms of Service, together with the relevant Privacy Policy and all other additional terms and information (collectively, these Terms) provided within the Service scope, apply to your use of our services, websites, content and software (collectively, the Services). By registering or using our Services or any part of them, you must indicate your acceptance of these Terms.

These Terms constitute an agreement between You and HMD Global Oy (address: Bertel Jungin aukio 9, 02600 Espoo, Finland) (including its subsidiaries and suppliers, collectively, HMD Global), which sets out the rights and responsibilities of you and HMD Global in respect of the Services.

2. Qualifications
You must be over 13 years old to use our services. If you are under 13, or you are over 13 but not regarded as an adult in your country, your parent or legal guardian must register on your behalf and approve your use of our services. Any person filling in the registration form must have the legal capacity to act.

3. Registration and Termination
In order to use a particular service, you must register and create an HMD account with a username and password (which must comply with the relevant separate terms). You must also provide us with certain personal details and other information. HMD Global will verify your email address before you use your HMD account. A text message will be sent to HMD Global the first time you use your device and each time that you update your Nokia devices software. Creating an HMD requires the transfer of relevant data and the collection of relevant data transfer costs.

You hereby agree to provide accurate and complete information when registering for services, and to update such information. You must do everything possible to protect your username and passport, and prevent other people from misusing them. If you discover that such misuse has occurred, you must inform HMD Global immediately. You and your parent or legal guardian (if you are not an adult) are responsible for your actions in using the services.

If you do not wish to use our services, you can terminate your registration. After you terminate the registration, you will no longer be able to access our services. If HMD Global can reasonably conclude that you are violating these terms and conditions, or that you have not used your username to sign up for a particular service within the last six months, HMD Global may terminate or restrict your access to particular services by sending you a notification in advance.

HMD Global undertakes no liability for the deletion or loss of information or content that you provide to the services, except as specified in the Privacy Policy. Traces or copies of the relevant information or content may still exist in other places after you or HMD Global delete them from the services.

4. Licenses
HMD Global hereby grants you a non-exclusive and non-transferable license (HMD Global may revoke such licenses at its sole discretion) to access and use the services; however, you must strictly abide by the provisions of each section of these terms. The act of using the services does not grant you any intellectual property rights to any information or content within your services.

As part of the services, HMD Global may provide you certain content (“the Content”) developed by HMD Global or its licensees. HMD Global grants you a non-exclusive, perpetual license to use such Content for the anticipated purpose, unless otherwise stipulated in the relevant terms or purchase orders. Some Content may only be provided to citizens in certain geographical regions. You must comply with any restrictions that apply to your use of specific content obtained through the services. Any third-party content license constitutes a binding agreement reached between you and the third-party content operator. You have the right to use the content specifically authorized in these terms.

As part of the services, HMD Global may provide you certain software (“the Software”) developed by HMD Global or its licensees. Your use of the Software must comply with the separate terms and conditions that you accepted before using the Software. If there are no separate terms and conditions that apply to such Software, the following terms shall be applied: HMD Global grants you the exclusive, non-transferable right to install and use the Software on your computer and/or mobile device. You may not copy the Software other than to make a single backup. You may not issue or transfer the following rights: use, modify, translate, copy, resell, distribute, rent out, lease, reverse-engineer, or otherwise attempt to discover the Softwares source code or development products derived from the Software. The license terms of the relevant open source licenses shall apply to software with open source licenses. By using the Software, you indicate that your accept any applicable terms and conditions.

The Software may be subject to provisions of export control rules under US export administration regulations, or to other import/export control regulations. You agree to strictly comply with all applicable import/export regulations and hereby confirm that you are responsible for obtaining any relevant licenses that are required to export, re-export, transfer or import the Software.

You may provide the services with certain information or content (“the Materials”). HMD Global does not claim ownership of your Materials. Your actions in providing the Materials by no means indicate that you are transferring ownership of the Materials to HMD Global. HMD Global is solely responsible for transferring the Materials, and shall not accept liability for the editorial control of such content. By providing the Materials to the services, you indicate that you grant HMD Global a global license that is non-exclusive, redistributable, transferable, fully paid up with no royalties, permanent and irrevocable (and thereby to use, copy, publicly enforce, display or distribute such Materials in any medium, to modify the Materials to facilitate their incorporation into other works, and to grant similar sub-licenses within the scope of the provision of services by HMD Global). You can adjust these licenses and other service settings in a confidential manner.

You are only responsible for accessing backup copies of data that you have stored in the services (including content that you upload). HMD Global may permanently delete your data if the services are suspended or cancelled. HMD Global has no obligation to return the relevant data to you after the services are suspended or cancelled.

5. Using the Services
You hereby agree that
• You will comply with the applicable laws, these terms, and best practice methods.
• You will only use the services for your personal, non-commercial purposes.
• You will not submit materials that are illegal, aggressive, inaccurate, misleading, abusive, pornographic, slanderous or constitute harassment, or other inappropriate materials.
• You will obtain any consent, permissions or licenses legitimately required for you to submit any materials.
• • You will respect the privacy of others.
• You will not distribute or email junk mail, very large files, chain emails, pyramid schemes or viruses.
• You will not use any technologies or initiate any such events/activities that could damage the services or the rights, interests or property of service users.
• You will not use any automatic systems or methods, [to] access, obtain, copy, or monitor the services or any part there of.
• You are liable for all relevant consequences of the services that you mail.

HMD Global may (but has no obligation to):
• Monitor or adjust the Content or the Materials.
• Delete materials from the services.
• Restrict access to the services or any part thereof at any time at its sole discretion.

6. Content
Before you download or access any content, please check whether the content you wish to access has any age restrictions or is potentially “offensive” or “suggestive”.

HMD Global accepts no liability for any compensation claims or criminal actions caused or encountered by your accessing the content.

You hereby agree that
• You will only use the content for your personal, non-commercial purposes.
• You will use the content in accordance with the relevant laws, supplementary articles, guidance and policies, or the product pages applicable to particular portion of the content.
• You may not photocopy, give, sell, resell, mortgage, hire, provide, broadcast, send, distribute, transfer, communicate to the public, replicate, modify, display, execute, or develop or provide content on a commercial basis, unless separately authorized to do so in the applicable articles. If you discover any unauthorized use, you must inform HMD Global immediately.
• You may not remove, circumvent, reverse-design, decrypt or otherwise change or interfere with any applicable usage regulations or attempt to circumvent digital rights management, or copy other technological protection features associated with the content or used to control the access or use of content or information identified therein.
• You may not use any automated systems or methods to select or download content, other than those provided by the company.
• You may not disclose your password or otherwise permit another person to access the content.

Any applicable restrictions on copying the relevant media are also applicable to content that forms part of these services.

The content is owned and/or controlled by HMD Global and/or its various licensees, and is protected by intellectual property laws. Third-party content operators are only responsible for content that they provided, assurances that they have not forfeited, and any appeals by you pertaining to the content or your actions in using the content. However, HMD Global may act as a third-party beneficiary of these terms with regard to your performance of these third-party content licensing terms. As third-party beneficiaries of these terms, third-party content providers may exercise [these rights] with regard to the content to which they hold rights. In the process of providing you with content, HMD Global may act an agent for such third-party content operators. HMD Global is not a party to any transactions between you and third-party content operators with regard to such content.

7. Copyright Infringement Statement
HMD Global respects the intellectual property (IP) rights of third parties. If you would like to send an IP rights infringement notice (including compensation claims for rights infringements), please use our rights infringement notice submission procedure. No response will be given to any inquiries that are not relevant to this procedure.

HMD Global will respond to all copyright infringement notices using the procedure stipulated in Chapter 17, Article 512 of the United States Code (USC). In the relevant circumstances, HMD Global may prohibit use or terminate your HMD Global service user account (such users could become repeat infringers).

8. Notice
HMD Global may send notices that are relevant within the scope of the services. HMD Global may also send notices concerning products and services to the email or phone number that you provided to us. Such notices will be deemed received by you no later than 7 days from the date on which HMD Global sent or mailed the notice. By continuing to use our services, you will be deemed to have received all notices (not relevant to methods of payment notification) sent by us.

9. Fees
You may need to pay certain fees to use the services.

Any fees charged by HMD Global are individually listed with regard to the service.

Using the services may involve transferring certain data through the service operators network. Service prices do not include data transfer fees, text message fees, voice service fees or other service provision charges stipulated by your network service carrier.

HMD Global is not responsible for paying any fees charged by your service carrier.

10. Ordering and Payment Terms
The order should specify:

In accordance with the provisions of the applicable laws, if you wish to send a service order, you must have reached the age of legal competency to act or the age of adulthood. If you have not reached the age of legal competency to act or the age of adulthood, you may only send an order after obtaining the consent of your parent or legal guardian.

You hereby agree that all orders have legal force and are legally binding. All orders must be accepted by HMD Global.

You can pay by credit or debit card, via your internet service carriers payment method, or by other methods of payment.

Your credit or debit card must have a payment address in the country in which the services are provided. HMD Global will charge the amount that is on your credit card or perform a debit on your bank card within a reasonable period of time after you sent an order.

All credit card payments must undergo validity checks and must be authorized by the card issuer.

If you choose the network service carrier payment method, the relevant fees will be sent to your mobile phone bill or deducted from your prepaid account. Some network service carriers may impose additional terms and conditions on your use of the services, including the imposition of limits on your network service charges. Charges that exceed the network service carriers limits or the balance on your account may be declined.

You agree to pay the relevant fees for your order and ensure that the payment instrument is valid for the order period, that you are the legal holder of the instrument, and that you will use the instrument within the credit limit.

You are licensed to use any content that has been delivered to you. You agree to use the content only in accordance with these terms and any supplementary articles in the order process.

The services provide subscription content. During the subscription period, you authorize us to send a periodic fee within the service. The services may provide a trial period. If your order involves a particular trial period (also referred to as purchase after trial use), you will be charged the relevant fees after the trial period expires, unless you cancel in accordance with the subscription/trial terms.

Service prices may change at any time. Unless otherwise stipulated, service prices include the relevant taxes in effect at the time of the transaction. Any additional fees may be incurred at your bank or credit card operator based on the exchange rates for the currency used and/or the additional fees assessed.

11. Cancellation and Refunds
You agree that we will deliver the relevant content in electronic form after you send an order. Your order cannot be cancelled once it has been processed, and neither may the relevant content be returned.

If you discover that any of the following circumstances applies after you send your order, you should immediately inform HMD Global within 48 hours: (a) There are errors in the content ordered; (b) There are discrepancies between the content you ordered via the service and the content delivered by HMD Global; (c) Relevant technical problems have delayed or the delivery of the content to you, or such technical problems have caused accidental multiple orders. In such circumstances, your only and exclusive remedy with regard to the content is to exchange the content or refund the amount paid for such content; HMD Global will make specific decisions based on the circumstances.

Other than this, no refunds will be given. Please contact the HMD Global Customer Service Department if you encounter the aforementioned technical problems.

Please note that if you are unable to provide your transaction ID (the transaction ID provided by HMD Global after you sent the service order), the HMD Global Customer Service Department will not be able to process your customer support request. If the total price exceeds the money limit stipulated by the relevant local laws, HMD Global will take responsibility for processing the content refund.

12. Providing feedback to HMD Global
By providing any opinions, feedback and/or proposals to HMD Global via the service or other methods (“the Feedback”), you indicate that you confirm and agree that: (1) HMD Global possesses development ideas similar to the Feedback; (2) Your Feedback does not include confidential or exclusive information pertaining to your or any third party; (3) HMD Global shall not undertake any confidentiality obligations with regard to the Feedback; (4) HMD Global may freely utilize, distribute, develop and further develop and modify such Feedback for any purpose; (5) You are not entitled to receive any form of remuneration from HMD Global.

13. Social Activities and Location Sharing
You may use the functions in the services to share your location, status, materials or personal information, or to interact with other users, websites and services. By using these functions you indicate that you agree that HMD Global may use such information and provide it to other service organizations and personnel that you have chosen to interact or share with. These service users and personnel, for example your contacts, may see your location, status and/or personal information. During the process of using these functions, you agree that you will not share the following information, content or materials, or establish links with any service or website: (a) contains illegal or inappropriate content or other materials; or (b) unauthorized development of IP rights, or encouraging users to engage in plagiarism. All interactions take place between you and other users, and as such do not involve HMD Global.

14. Availability and Technical Requirements
The availability of content and services may change, and is subject to the sole discretion of HMD Global. HMD Global expressly disclaims any statements or guarantees regarding the availability of specific content or services. HMD Global does not provide services in all countries, and only provides the services in a few selected languages. The services and their operations and certain functions are also determined by the compatibility and supported content formats of the relevant networks and the device used.

In order to access the services, you need to download specific software or part thereof from HMD Global or another developer.

HMD Global may modify, correct or suspend all or part of the service based on the circumstances, and is likely to not provide services during the maintenance period and at other times. To ensure that you have the latest device software and applications, your device may automatically check the possibility of updating the software from HMD Global. If any updates are detected, you will be notified to approve their installation. You can configure the device to disable the automatic update check function. You can install software through the software update channels provided. If HMD Global believes that a software update is extremely important, you should stop using the earlier version of the software. HMD Global may prevent you from using earlier versions of the software or services until you install the updates.

HMD Global may disable the use of any content or software in your service account, remove any content or software, and/or disable any copies of applications on your order device, in order to protect the services, application operators, and the wireless carriers through whose networks you access the services or any other party that is affected or may be affected.

Specific services may take the form of pre-release versions, such as test versions, and may not necessarily work in the way that the final version operates. HMD Global may make major changes to the service or software versions, or decide not to release a final version.

15. Links to Third-Party Websites and Content
HMD Global may provide access paths to other sites and services on its Internet or pre-downloaded client end; thereby allowing you to interact with sites and services owned or operated by third parties (such sites and services do not count as part of the services under these terms). Before using such sites and services, you must read and agree to the terms and conditions of these sites and services.

HMD Global has no right to control third-party content, websites or services. For this reason, HMD Global undertakes no liability for the services provided or the materials created or published based on these third-party sites or services. A link to a particular third-party website by no means implies that HMD Global agrees with the site or the products or services mentioned therein.

Additionally, you and other users may create relevant content and links to content contained in the services (without providing such content to the services described in these terms.) HMD Global undertakes no liability for content or links of this type.

16. Advertising
The services may include some adverts. These adverts point to content or information stored on the services, inquiries provided through the services, or other information.

17. Personal Information
The privacy policy provided and any additional privacy information is applicable to your use of your personal information.

18. Limitations of Liability
The service is provided on the basis of the “current situation” and “availability”. HMD Global does not guarantee that the service will not be interrupted or does not contain errors for viruses. HMD Global makes no explicit or implicit guarantees of the availability, accuracy, reliability, information or content of the services, including but not limited to ownership rights, non-infringement of rights guarantees, saleability guarantees, or guarantees of suitability for a specific purpose. You clearly agree and confirm that you understand that the risk is yours when you use the services, and that you may encounter content from a variety of sources.

Excluding liability for death or personal injury caused by culpable negligence or malfeasance, HMD Global shall accept no liability for indirect, accidental, or punitive damages caused by your use or inability to use the services.

19. Compensation
You agree to compensate and indemnify HMD Global from all third-party compensation claims and liability, taxation, losses, costs or damages arising from the following content: (i) You violate these terms; (ii) You infringe or violate any IP rights, other rights or the privacy of a third party; (iii) A third party misuses the services and such misuse originates from your failure to take reasonable measures to protect your username and password from being abused.

20. Other

20.1 Choice of Law
These terms are subject to the jurisdiction of the laws of Finland (without consideration to its legal conflict regulations).

20.2 Validity
These terms neither exclude nor limit any statutory right that you have not waived in your country of residence. If any provision of these terms is judged to be invalid, the validity of the other provisions shall not be affected. The invalid provisions should be replaced with valid provisions that are closest to the intention and goals of these terms. If one or several provisions of these terms are irrelevant to your use of the services, this does not affect the validity or enforceability of the other provisions of the terms or of this article.

In case of conflicts between HMD Global ‘s terms of service and its privacy policy, the application of these HMD Global terms of service should be given priority. After these terms have terminated, any terms that should remain valid after your registration is terminated shall continue to be valid.

20.3 Changes to the Terms
HMD Global may revise these terms at any time without any separate notification. If there are any major, adverse changes to the terms, HMD Global shall send out a separate notice informing you of the changes.

You should read these terms periodically. By continuing to use the services, you indicate that you agree to any changes or amendments thereto.

21. Intellectual Property Rights
The services, content and software are subject to the protection of international copyright law. HMD Global has ownership of the copyright in its services, content and software to the maximum extent permitted by the law. In accordance with the provisions of these terms, HMD Global reserves all rights, ownership and interests for the services and the content and software thereof, as well as all other HMD Global products, software, and assets provided to you or which you use via the services.

22. Transferal
HMD Global may transfer its rights and obligations under these terms to its parent company or any subsidiary or any company that is jointly controlled by HMD Global. HMD Global may transfer its rights and obligations under these terms to any third party that is affiliated with HMD Global as a result of mergers, asset sales, legal provisions, or other reasons.
